title: Amulet 2
description: An erotic adventure novel. Jason Ramsey has the perfect life until tragedy strikes, and he needs the help of a new, much more powerful amulet to set things right. This amulet will take him on a journey into his past, where he will discover that small changes in his past have huge consequences in his future. But through all his travels, he is always drawn back to the woman he loves.Surprises abound as Jason races to solve a mystery and save his wife and daughter. Everyone is back from the popular original in this sexy and fun adventure. Adults only due to graphic sexual situations. (67,000 words / 270 standard pages)
author: S. Wolf
